coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR800.00 (as part of optical limit)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered including donor medical costs and the cost of the organ, including kidney transplants; Organ transplantation (fresh or synthetic), organ or marrow transplants, or the implant of artificial organs to replace any part of the body are covered.
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 4,000.00, Deductible: Nil, dental medical treatment fully covered (see special instructions for details)
coverage_details.dental_corrective: Anterior and Posterior Crowns are NOT covered
coverage_details.optical: SR 800.00; All lens specifications, contact lenses, and intraocular lenses covered within optical limit. No sub-limit for surgical cases; Eye Laser/Retinopathy/Retinal surgeries covered up to SR 20,000 if medically required. Frames covered as part of optical limit.
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered - Up to Annual Limit; physiotherapy, occupational therapy, developmental therapy, and rehabilitation treatment covered when medically required.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Dental and optical detailed benefits included; artificial limbs covered; allergy testing and treatment; hearing loss and delayed speech; medical appliances and devices (basic) with user-friendly functionality; skin diseases (including pigmentation, acne, wart treatment); insulin pumps and diabetic devices for eligible age groups; hip and knee replacements (fees include pre- and post-surgery physiotherapy); medication limit is equal to pre-authorisation approval limit.
